refnamediv.refname: RFC CDK #21: Replacement of SetOfMolecules by SetOfAtomContainers

refsect1.title: Proposal
refsect1.para: To create a new class called SetOfAtomContainers that will replace the use of SetOfMolecules in ChemModel. The SetOfMolecules will not be removed but will be a sublass of SetOfAtomContainers, and will keep the API it has now, in addition to the methods inherited.

refsect1.title: Reason
refsect1.para: A ChemModel should be able to contain a SetOfAtomContainers, in the future allowing the possible removal of getCrystal().
